item.title: MBK 控制的乐天卡称近 300 万客户的个人数据被泄露
item.description: 由私募股权基金 MBK 控制的韩国乐天卡公司周四表示，由于受到黑客攻击，约 297 万客户的个人数据已经泄露。【原文：South Korean credit card company Lotte Card, which is controlled by private equity fund MBK, said on Thursday that the personal data of some 2.97 million customers has been leaked due to a hacking attack.】

item.title: 澳大利亚失败的最大收购交易
item.description: 阿布扎比国家石油公司（Abu Dhabi National Oil Company）牵头的一个财团周三撤回了其 187 亿美元收购澳大利亚天然气生产商桑托斯公司（Santos）的报价，在此之前，该财团已就估值和条款争论了数月。【原文：A consortium led by Abu Dhabi National Oil Company on Wednesday withdrew its $18.7 billion offer to buy Australian gas producer Santos after months of wrangling over valuation and terms.】

item.title: 糖果生产商玛氏公司计划投资 12 亿美元促进欧盟业务发展
item.description: 玛氏公司（M&M's）和 Skittles 的制造商玛氏公司周四表示，它将在 2026 年底前向欧盟业务投资 10 亿欧元（11.8 亿美元），以促进该地区的生产、可持续发展和创新。【原文：Mars, the maker of M&M's and Skittles, said on Thursday it will invest 1 billion euros ($1.18 billion) in its European Union operations by the end of 2026 to boost manufacturing, sustainability and innovation pipeline in the region.】

item.title: 巴里卡乐宝首席执行官称债务必须减少
item.description: 本周四发表的一篇采访引用了公司首席执行官彼得-菲尔德（Peter Feld）的话：世界顶级巧克力制造商巴里-卡乐堡（Barry Callebaut）必须减少债务，并正在为此而努力。【原文：The world's top chocolatier Barry Callebaut must reduce its debt and is working to achieve this, CEO Peter Feld was quoted as saying in an interview published on Thursday.】

item.title: 黎巴嫩的不良债务飙升至不稳定的新高度
item.description: 在过去的一年里，黎巴嫩违约政府债券的价格几乎翻了两番，因为投资者押注于经济复苏的迹象。【原文：Lebanon's defaulted government bonds have nearly quadrupled in price over the past year as investors bet on signs of economic recovery but a wild variance in estimates of their likely worth after a restructuring could restrain any further rally.】

item.title: 消息人士称，软银与 OpenAI 日本人工智能合资公司推迟成立
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的消息人士透露，软银与 OpenAI 成立合资公司，为日本企业客户提供人工智能服务的计划大大落后于原定计划。【原文：SoftBank's plans to set up a joint venture with OpenAI to bring artificial intelligence services to corporate customers in Japan are significantly behind schedule, according to a source familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 如果嘉能可同意，盎格鲁-泰克合并将释放智利矿山的协同效应
item.description: 英美资源集团与泰克集团合并的提议重燃了智利北部两大矿山共享基础设施的长期雄心，但分析师称，该计划可能面临获得瑞士矿商和贸易商嘉能可公司（Glencore）收购的障碍。【原文：The proposed Anglo American-Teck merger has revived long-standing ambitions to share infrastructure at two major mines in northern Chile, but analysts say the plan could face hurdles to gain buy-in from Swiss miner and trader Glencore.】

item.title: 外国人在中断两个月后于 8 月份抢购亚洲债券
item.description: 8 月份，亚洲债券吸引了三个月来的首次月度外资流入，原因是美国联邦储备委员会（U.S. Federal Reserve）降息以支持劳动力市场降温的预期刺激了对高收益新兴市场的需求。【原文：Asian bonds attracted their first monthly foreign inflow in three months in August, as expectations of U.S. Federal Reserve rate cuts to support a cooling labour market boosted demand for higher-yielding emerging markets.】

item.title: 研究发现，美国对欧盟的进口依存度正在上升，超过了中国
item.description: 根据德国 IW 经济研究所的一项研究，美国对从欧盟进口的依赖程度比人们通常认为的要高，无论是总价值还是商品数量，欧盟都超过了中国。【原文：The United States relies more heavily on imports from the European Union than commonly assumed, with the bloc surpassing China in both total value and the number of goods, according to a study from Germany's IW economic institute.】

item.title: 罗氏拟最高 35 亿美元收购肝脏药物开发商 89bio
item.description: 罗氏公司周四表示，同意以不超过 35 亿美元的价格收购美国生物技术公司 89bio ETNB.O，以加强其在肝脏和心脏代谢疾病治疗方面的开发管线。【原文：Roche said on Thursday it agreed to acquire U.S. biotech firm 89bio ETNB.O for up to $3.5 billion to strengthen its development pipeline on liver and cardiometabolic disease treatments.】

item.title: 斯塔默和特朗普将在充满奢华的王室欢迎仪式后讨论外交事务和投资问题
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周四将与英国首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）举行会谈，旨在将美国领导人史无前例的第二次国事访问的重点坚定地放在全球事务上，而不是国内政治问题上。【原文：Donald Trump meets British Prime Minister Keir Starmer on Thursday for talks designed to focus the U.S. leader's unprecedented second state visit firmly on global affairs rather than domestic political problems.】

item.title: 美联储降息附带警告，投资者反应冷淡
item.description: 在美联储恢复降息并为进一步宽松政策敞开大门之后，投资者未来几个月将面临动荡不安的局面。【原文：Investors look set to face a volatile few months ahead after the Federal Reserve resumed interest rate cuts and opened the door to further easing but tempered its message with warnings of sticky inflation, sowing doubt over the pace of future policy adjustments.】

item.title: 前央行官员称，即使高市赢得领导层竞选，日本央行也可能在 10 月加息
item.description: 前央行高管下田智之周四表示，即使支持积极宽松货币政策的佐佐江隆一在执政党领导层竞选中获胜并成为下一任首相，日本央行也可能在10月份加息。【原文：The Bank of Japan could raise interest rates in October even if Sanae Takaichi, a proponent of aggressive monetary easing, wins the ruling party's leadership race and becomes the next premier, former central bank executive Tomoyuki Shimoda said on Thursday.】

item.title: 早间竞标：美联储有数十年如一日的工作周
item.description: 格雷戈尔-斯图尔特-亨特（Gregor Stuart Hunter）展望欧洲和全球市场的未来一天：【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Gregor Stuart Hunter:】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》报道：在美国贸易谈判之际，中国结束对谷歌的反垄断调查
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周四报道，中国正在结束对谷歌的反垄断调查，而在两国紧张局势加剧之际，北京与华盛顿就 TikTok 和 Nvidia 的贸易谈判也在加紧进行。【原文：China is ending an antitrust probe into Google, as trade talks between Beijing and Washington intensify over TikTok and Nvidia amid rising tensions between the two countries, the Financial Times reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 松下计划在两年内开发出突破性的电动汽车电池
item.description: 松下公司的目标是在大约两年内开发出一种新型高容量电池，从而有可能延长电动汽车的行驶里程，这对特斯拉供应商来说是一项突破性进展。【原文：Panasonic aims to develop a new type of higher-capacity battery in about two years, potentially extending the driving range of electric vehicles in a groundbreaking advance for the Tesla supplier.】

item.title: 美国农业部长告诉英国《金融时报》，特朗普关税可能为美国农民提供救助资金
item.description: 英国《金融时报》周四援引农业部长布鲁克-罗林斯（Brooke Rollins）的话报道称，特朗普政府正在制定计划，利用关税收入资助一项支持美国农民的计划。【原文：The Trump administration is drawing up plans to use tariff revenue to fund a program to support U.S. farmers, the Financial Times reported on Thursday, citing agriculture secretary Brooke Rollins.】

item.title: 巴宝莉将在伦敦时装周天桥上测试复兴计划
item.description: 巴宝莉曾邀请奥斯卡影后奥利维亚-科尔曼（Olivia Colman）和绿洲乐队主唱利亚姆-加拉格尔（Liam Gallagher）为其英伦传统和经典风衣代言。【原文：Burberry's turnaround drive, which has tapped Oscar winner Olivia Colman and Oasis frontman Liam Gallagher to champion its British heritage and classic trench coats, faces a fresh test on Monday when it unveils its latest designs at London Fashion Week.】

item.title: 墨西哥 Femsa 任命 Jose Antonio Fernandez Garza-Laguera 为首席执行官
item.description: 墨西哥装瓶商和零售商 Femsa 周三任命何塞-安东尼奥-费尔南德斯-加尔萨-拉格拉（Jose Antonio Fernandez Garza-Laguera）为新任首席执行官，任期从 11 月 1 日开始。【原文：Mexican bottler and retailer Femsa on Wednesday appointed Jose Antonio Fernandez Garza-Laguera as the new chief executive officer, starting on November 1.】

item.title: 据当地媒体报道，华为发布两款新型超级计算人工智能节点
item.description: 据当地媒体《中国星市场》（China Star Market）报道，华为公司副董事长徐直军周四表示，公司计划在今年第四季度推出世界上计算能力最强的节点 Atlas 950。【原文：Huawei's Vice Chairman Eric Xu said on Thursday the company plans to launch the world's most powerful computing power node called the Atlas 950 in the fourth quarter of this year, local media China Star Market reported.】

item.title: 韩国有条件批准阿里巴巴与新世界集团成立合资企业
item.description: 韩国竞争监管机构周四有条件地批准了阿里巴巴国际旗下的阿里速卖通（AliExpress Korea）与当地公司新世界集团（Shinsegae）旗下的一个部门成立合资企业，但提出了对共享客户信息的担忧。【原文：South Korea's competition regulator on Thursday conditionally approved a joint venture between Alibaba International's AliExpress Korea and a unit of local company Shinsegae, but cited concerns over the sharing of customer information.】

item.title: 美国联邦贸易委员会在有关 Prime 注册的审判前赢得针对亚马逊的关键裁决
item.description: 美国联邦贸易委员会声称，零售巨头亚马逊的 Prime 订阅服务违反了消费者保护法，在下周开庭审理之前，法官在几个关键问题上做出了有利于该委员会、不利于亚马逊的裁决。【原文：A judge ruled for the U.S. Federal Trade Commission and against Amazon on several key issues ahead of a trial next week on the agency's claims that the retail giant's Prime subscription practices violated consumer protection law.】

item.title: 诺斯罗普公司与美国国家航空航天局解决货运飞船发动机问题，国际空间站对接定于周四进行
item.description: 美国国家航空航天局（NASA）周三晚恢复了诺斯罗普-格鲁曼公司（Northrop Grumman）制造的货运飞船与国际空间站对接的计划，在此之前，NASA已经解决了一个发动机提前关闭的问题，NASA称这是由于飞船软件设置中的一个 "保守保障措施 "造成的。【原文：NASA on Wednesday night resumed plans to dock a Northrop Grumman-built cargo craft with the International Space Station after resolving an early engine-shutdown issue it said was caused by a "conservative safeguard" in the vehicle's software settings.】

item.title: 备忘录称，精神航空将削减 25% 的航班运力并裁员
item.description: 路透社周三看到的一份备忘录显示，精神航空公司将裁员，该公司计划在11月份将运力同比减少25%，这将加深这家低成本航空公司的困境。【原文：Spirit Airlines is set to cut jobs as the airline plans to reduce capacity by 25% year-on-year in November, according to a memo seen by Reuters on Wednesday, deepening woes for the low-budget carrier.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 8 月份就业人数意外下降，失业率保持稳定
item.description: 澳大利亚 8 月份的就业人数意外下降，因为全职职位在前一个月大幅上升后出现回落，而失业率则保持稳定，这表明劳动力市场正在缓慢走软。【原文：Australian employment unexpectedly fell in August as full-time positions dropped back after a sharp rise in the previous month, while the jobless rate held steady in a sign the labour market was slowly softening.】

item.title: 交易员评估美联储降息后的前景，股市和美元走势暂缓
item.description: 美联储降息后，周四全球股市趋于稳定，但在这家全球最大的央行发出进一步放宽货币政策的信号后，投资者仍持谨慎态度。【原文：Global stock markets steadied on Thursday after the Federal Reserve cut interest rates but investors were circumspect after the world's biggest central bank signalled a measured approach to further monetary policy easing.】

item.title: 星展银行、富兰克林邓普顿和瑞波公司合作开展代币化货币市场基金交易
item.description: 星展集团已与美国资产管理公司富兰克林邓普顿（Franklin Templeton）和区块链公司瑞波（Ripple）合作，利用代币化货币市场基金和瑞波的美元稳定币为经认可的机构投资者提供交易和借贷服务。【原文：DBS Group has partnered with U.S. asset manager Franklin Templeton and blockchain firm Ripple to offer accredited and institutional investors trading and lending services using tokenised money market funds and Ripple's U.S. dollar stablecoin.】

item.title: 美联储降息后油价变化不大
item.description: 周四，美国中央银行如市场普遍预期的那样下调了关键利率，而年底前将有更多降息举措的迹象则提升了借贷成本下降刺激需求的前景，此后油价变化不大。【原文：Oil prices were little changed on Thursday after the U.S. central bank lowered its key interest rate as widely expected, while an indication of more rate cuts before year-end raised the prospect of a demand boost spurred by falling borrowing costs.】

item.title: 澳大利亚监察机构称经济型零售商凯马特利用面部识别技术侵犯隐私权
item.description: 澳大利亚监管机构周四称，Wesfarmers 旗下的经济型百货公司凯马特（Kmart）通过面部识别技术系统收集个人敏感信息，以打击退款欺诈行为，从而侵犯了个人隐私。【原文：An Australian regulator has found Wesfarmers' budget department store Kmart breached privacy by collecting personal and sensitive information via a facial recognition technology system designed to combat refund fraud, it said on Thursday.】

item.title: 巴西提出吸引数据中心、规范数字竞争的建议
item.description: 巴西总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦（Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva）周三签署了一项行政命令，旨在通过免除部分相关设备的联邦税来吸引数据中心落户巴西，同时还签署了一项规范数字竞争的法案。【原文：Brazilian President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva on Wednesday signed an executive order aimed at luring data centers to the country by exempting some related equipment from federal taxes, as well a bill to regulate digital competition.】
